title: Almost Eighteen
description: Wilson Mooney, is one girl who knows what itâ€™s like to grow up way too fast. Now, a month away from turning eighteen and orphaned by the death of her grandparents; she knows exactly what she wants. When "he" happens to show up at a party in Aspen, she gets tangled in the powerful emotions of first love, sexual inexperience, and society's principles; all while keeping their weekend a secret.
author: Gretchen de la O
